meta.title: Shenzhen Shenye Jinzhan Materials Supply Co., Ltd. - About Us
meta.description: One-Stop Supply Chain Solutions for Research Procurement

about.title: Company Profile
about.text1: Established in 2005, Shenzhen Shenye Jinzhan Materials Supply Co., Ltd. serves high-tech industries, scientific research, and higher education fields. We provide comprehensive supply chain services including procurement agency, import/export processing, duty refund consulting, logistics, and equipment authentication for universities, research institutions, and high-tech enterprises.
about.text2: Over 20 years, we have imported over 10 billion RMB worth of cutting-edge research equipment for hundreds of universities and research institutions nationwide. We support the development of national, provincial, and municipal key laboratories and R&D centers, contributing to scientific innovation and industrial advancement.

mission.title: Corporate Mission
mission.text: Enable Researchers to Focus on Research, Make Procurement Worry-Free

vision.title: Corporate Vision
vision.text: To Become the Industry Benchmark in China's Research Procurement Supply Chain Services

positioning.title: Corporate Positioning
positioning.text: One-Stop Supply Chain Solution Provider for Research Procurement
